item.title: Bio
item.description: Subhrajit Das is an incoming PhD student in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Gandhinagar. His current research interests include Distributed Systems and Usable Privacy & Security. He completed his M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from IIT Gandhinagar, where he worked with Prof. Abhishek Bichhawat (IIT Gandhinagar) and Prof. Yuvraj Patel (University of Edinburgh) on optimizing large-integer arithmetic. Prior to that, he earned an M.Sc in Computer Science from the University of Kalyani and a B.
